channel.title: AzRoleWatcher
channel.description: Continuously monitor roles and permissions in Microsoft Entra ID and Azure.

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: d715fb95-a0f0-4f1c-8be6-5ad2d2767f67
Display name: AVS Orchestrator Role
Description: Custom role for AVS to manage customer resources used for AVS scenarios.
Link: https://management.azure.com/d715fb95-a0f0-4f1c-8be6-5ad2d2767f67?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 4e9d0bd4-5aab-4f91-92df-9def33fe287c
Display name: CloudTest Contributor Role
Description: Read, write, delete and perform actions on CloudTest Accounts, CloudTest Pools, 1ES Hosted Pools and 1ES Images.
Link: https://management.azure.com/4e9d0bd4-5aab-4f91-92df-9def33fe287c?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 6e0c8711-85a0-4490-8365-8ec13c4560b4
Display name: Stream Analytics Contributor
Description: Contributor access to Clusters and Streaming Jobs
Link: https://management.azure.com/6e0c8711-85a0-4490-8365-8ec13c4560b4?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:

Description: Read-only access to Clusters and Streaming Jobs
